info.title: Ylitse MentorApp
info.description1: In the Ylitse MentorApp peer mentoring service, mentors help you with your personal situation confidentially. You can choose a suitable mentor based on your problem and get help regardless of time and place.
info.description2: - You can use the app anonymously and confidentially.
info.description3: - The service is free of charge.
info.description4: - You will meet people who have been in the same situation.
info.description5: They know what you are talking about.

newMessages.title: You have new messages
newMessages.text: If you want to return to previous conversations, new messages are waiting for you in the chat.

mentee.title: Start by finding a mentor
mentee.text: Browse mentor profiles or search by a specific keyword. Once you find a suitable mentor, you can start a conversation with them.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.notice1: Welcome to the Ylitse MentorApp service!

concepts.title: Concepts
concepts.description: Here are some concepts to make using the service easier.

concept1.name: Status message
concept1.definition: If a mentor is not available, for example, due to vacation, they can announce it with a status message. The status message is visible in the mentor's profile and in the chat with the mentor.

info.title: Peer support for young people and adults
info.text: You can talk to peer mentors about any issue weighing on your mind. A peer mentor can be a companion, guide, understanding listener, or coach for various situations in life.
